description.value:
1x1 metre panel whose effect extends 10 metres above panel. Can manipulate gravity between 0.1x and 10x Terra's Gravity, and remotely activated either individually or 10 at a time. Once activated, takes 1 round to take effect and creates audible whining sound.

Effect: Average

Notes: -
